features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication with Supabase Auth including login, register, password reset

features.name: Wallet System
features.description: User wallet for deposits, withdrawals, and balance management with MercadoPago integration

features.name: Car Management
features.description: Car listing, publication, editing, and management for car owners

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Car rental booking flow with wallet payment and MercadoPago integration

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile editing, avatar upload, and personal information management

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin dashboard for car approvals, user management, and platform metrics
